name: 人类保存计划 Human Save Plan
name_original: 人类保存计划 Human Save Plan
description:
This is a Diablo like RPG treasure brushing game. The game is played in a box court style map. Players need to defeat monsters, collect their dropped props, and use affix combinations to match the props they need. The collection and combination of props and affixes is the main method of playing the game


  • The combination of props, equipment, and skills is collectively referred to as props, which is simpler and faster to use. Props have performance time, and skills are unlimited during performance time.

  • The props can be edited at will, and the affixes on the props can be interchanged and combined at will.

  • By combining affixes, you can gain stronger skills or increase massive attribute values, all of which are at the player's choice.

  • Adding a thought output system can change the AI logic of any object. You can also change the object camp and unlock them as operable characters. Different characters have different growth rates. Go collect powerful BOSS!
